name: ReSizE
description:
ReSizE is a new single player game. Set in the mysterious C.T.O.D. Laboratories.
Complete all workout and get gummy bears.

In each level you need to kill the training drone. All that can your weapon is to enlarge and reduce objects. So you need to solve a puzzle to complete a workout.

FEATURES:
  • 20+ levels, with an estimated gameplay time of ~4-10 hours.
  • Challenging and unusual puzzles.
  • Original music.
  • The voice Actor of the protagonist is the same as in the Gordon Freeman
